description: Mimi’s Sodas is treating the people at the Pepper Place Market to totally yummy sodas and floats that everyone in Birmingham must have at some point.  You’re sure to purely savor their sodas with gourmet flavors galore, like Orange Cream, Bittered Ginger, Lime Basil, and Coffee. And of course, their fantastic floats, including Caramel Apple (Apple Soda, Salted Caramel Ice Cream, Thyme Peanuts), Cheesecake (Strawberry Soda, Buttermilk Ice Cream, Graham Crust), and more!So come on over to Mimi’s Sodas for a sweet experience that’s so delish.
name: Mimi's Sodas
